_sText:
A rotating changing Billboard (i think thats how Americans say it) Anyway it can display up to 4 different logo's / adverts whatever you want to call them. This looks alot better than just some blocky letters spelling out the map authors name that i have seen on some maps, and an excellent sponsorship opportunity to place ads on successful maps To change them to your own personal banners, edit or create a new texture, CAUTION : Dont change the texture alignment unless you know what your doing, it took me ages to get right. If your not sure how to do this i will make you custom ones for a few points (price yet to be decided) If you make your own the dimensions must be 256 x 128 px To install copy the cstrike folder into your counterstrike folder. If you get pink and black squares your doing it wrong, as this uses custom textures. Anyway heres a video, so enjoy.
WeGame.com - Gaming Videos
